job.command:
ln -s /star/u/wangzhen/run20/Dielectron/Efficiecny/.sl73_gcc485 ./.sl64_gcc447 ln -s /star/u/wangzhen/run20/Dielectron/Efficiecny/.sl73_gcc485 ./ ln -s /star/u/wangzhen/run20/Dielectron/Efficiecny/StRoot ./ ln -s /star/u/wangzhen/run20/Dielectron/Efficiecny/doEvent.C ./
starver SL23a root4star -q -b ./doEvent.C\(-1,\"$FILELIST\",\"$SCRATCH/${JOBID}.root\",0\)
